Articles.Content: Is there a way to disable having text emoticons changed into graphical emoticons when typing a post?  Most forum/message-board systems have this option somewhere, but I can't find it here.
I don't think so, but it would be a nice feature.
Doesn't seem to be an option that I can see, sorry. Text in code blocks won't be automatically converted but I don't think that's quite what you're after.
